title: Million Dollar Ideas and Terrible Gifts with Ben Polizzi
description:
This week, Joe is in Indy and he's joined by an amazing comedian, Ben Polizzi! Joe shares the winners of the flare pen competition, and then Joe and Ben share several of their million-dollar inventions that will change the world (for better or worse!) before they read out the worst teacher-gifts ever given!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
